name: Windows Start Menu Sorter
short_description:
This program sorts a messy Windows Start Menu into categorized folders. It works for the currently logged in user and also the "All Users" start menu (if the user is an Administrator).

This early alpha 3 release has some features disabled but has the core functionality working. Be sure to click backup before sorting.

Written in C# it requires the latest .NET framework (.NET Framework 4.5.1) available from: https://www.microsoft.com/net/downloads

and has these System Requirements:
http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/8z6watww.aspx

SHA256 Hash: fe824ac0cd4385d942aae7285d24b05c4ea4d564423e501db0c4c6e062aad453
VirusTotal Report: https://www.virustotal.com/en/file/fe824ac0cd4385d942aae7285d24b05c4ea4d564423e501db0c4c6e062aad453/analysis/1425478139/

To submit a new folder that is not sorting or report a bug please visit: https://sourceforge.net/projects/windowsstartmenusorter/support?source=navbar and send me a message. For this I'd need the link/folder name and the category.
summary: Sorts a Windows Start Menu into categorized folders.
